title: Vidya Balan was first choice to play Geeta Bali in ‘Ek Albela’
text: Vidya Balan was first choice to play Geeta Bali in ‘Ek Albela’ Saturday, 17 October 2015 (15 minutes ago) The makers of "Ek Albela" say Bollywood star Vidya Balan was their first choice to play Geeta Bali in the biopic of legendary actor Bhagwan Dada. *The makers of "Ek Albela" say Bollywood star Vidya Balan was their first choice to play Geeta Bali in the biopic of legendary actor Bhagwan Dada.* The... Deccan Herald 6 hours ago - Entertainment Vidya Balan is set to play Geeta Bali in the Marathi film Bhagwan Dada Ek Albela… Shammi Kapoor and the late Geeta Bali’s son Aditya Raj Kapoor wonders why... Bollywood Life 4 days ago - India You Might Like Comments Twitter Prahaar The makers of "Ek Albela" say Bollywood star Vidya Balan was their first choice to play Geeta Bali in the biopic... http://t.co/38cST493Y5 13 minutes ago TV INDIA LIVE TIL Desk Bollywood/ Makers of "Ek Albela" say Bollywood star Vidya Balan was their first choice to play Geeta... http://t.co/F8z5CsnRrh 24 minutes ago Nitin Jain The makers of "Ek Albela" say Bollywood star Vidya Balan was their first choice to play Geeta Bali in biopic of legendary actor Bhagwan Dada 1 hour ago
